title: Amazfit Active 2 Smart Watch Round Black Leather Premium 44mm sp170073-C225
description:
Brand new Amazfit Active 2 Smart Watch, Premium 44mm Round Black Leather edition. This stylish and feature-rich smartwatch is compatible with Android and iOS, and comes with a premium leather band.

Key Features:
- Condition: New, unopened, undamaged, in original packaging
- Brand: Amazfit
- Model: Active 2
- Series: Amazfit Active 2
- Band Material: Leather
- Band Color: Black
- Case Size: 44 mm
- Compatible Operating System: Android, iOS (Apple)
- Operating System: Amazfit OS
- Features: GPS, Upgraded BioTracker 6.0 PPG biosensor (5PD +2LED), advanced heart rate and sleep tracking, stress level, blood oxygen, menstrual cycle tracking, daily readiness score, 316L stainless steel case, sapphire glass (premium version), auto-detects 25 strength exercises, Zepp Coach AI, 160+ sports modes, Zepp Flow AI voice control, Bluetooth calls, offline maps, 5-satellite GPS, 10-day battery life
- MPN: Does Not Apply
- UPC: Does Not Apply

Product Highlights:
- Stylish design with premium materials
- 2,000 nits max display brightness
- Leather or silicone strap options (premium version includes leather)
- Zepp Coach AI for personalized training plans
- Voice control and smart reply features (Android only)
- 5-satellite GPS and offline map support
- Up to 10 days battery life (normal use), 5 days heavy use, 21 hours continuous GPS

Category: Electronics > Wearable Technology > Smart Watches

Enjoy advanced health tracking, fitness features, and a premium look with the Amazfit Active 2. Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
